    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v2

    ValueWithAttributes Price

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v2:Price

      • Description

        Specifies price after all applicable taxes of a product such as the rate for a room or fare for a flight.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Price amountBeforeTax="23" currencyCode="USD" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v2">12</Price>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Price" : {
    "value" : 12.0,
    "amountBeforeTax" : 23.0,
    "currencyCode" : "USD"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        amountBeforeTax
        The price before taxes are applied.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:decimal
        Example Value 12
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        currencyCode
        The currency code for the amount.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:Code_Currency
        Example Value USD
        Required false
        Pattern ([a-zA-Z]{3})?
        Max Occurrences 1
